snippet: The show, which was panned by critics, contributed to the network’s underperforming Monday night comedy lineup. It follows ABC’s cancellation of “Lucky 7.”
lead_paragraph: The show, which was panned by critics, contributed to the network’s underperforming Monday night comedy lineup. It follows ABC’s cancellation of “Lucky 7.”

headline.main: In Another Early Cancellation, CBS Sheds ‘We Are Men’
